Package com.ltts

Class ExcelUtility

java.lang.Object
com.ltts.ExcelUtility
public class ExcelUtility
extends java.lang.Object
ExcelUtility class has methods related to setting up the excel file,reading the excel sheets and getting row and column counts.
Since:
1.0.0
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Sandesh Prabhu, DigendraKumar Sahu

      Gets cell data as object
      Parameters:
      sheet - Sheet of the excel workbook to get the data.
      rownum - Row number of the cell.
      cellnum - Column number of the cell.
      Returns:
      Cell data of the specified cell.

      Parameters:
      sheet - Excel sheet to get starting row of test case.
      testCaseName - Name of the test case.
      Returns:

      Returns:
